# Code of Conduct

## Our Commitment
We are committed to providing a welcoming and harassment-free experience for everyone.

## Expected Behavior
- Be respectful and constructive.
- Assume positive intent.
- Give and accept feedback professionally.

## Unacceptable Behavior
Harassment, discrimination, personal attacks, and any abusive behavior are not tolerated.

## Reporting
Report issues to the maintainers through private channels.

## Enforcement
Maintainers may remove, edit, or reject contributions and participation that violate this code of conduct.
